text: John Weldon Cale (December 5, 1938 â€“ July 26, 2013), commonly known as JJ Cale, was an American singer and songwriter. He was one of the people who started the Tulsa Sound. In 2008, he won a Grammy Award. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:Singers from Oklahoma Category:Musicians from Oklahoma
